summary: **JoJo's Bizarre Adventure** is a popular Japanese manga and anime series created by Hirohiko Araki. It tells the story of nine different characters, each nicknamed "JoJo," who live through exciting adventures. The series is famous for its cool art, references to Western music and fashion, and unique battles using special powers called "Stands." It has been adapted into several anime shows, a live-action movie, and video games. With over 120 million copies sold, it's one of the best-selling manga series ever.
title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
